artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Author: Yamana Tomesaburō; Author: Masukawa Kan'yū; Publisher: Fukyūsha; Carver: Noguchi Enkatsu; Carver: Tsuchiyama
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: light blue cover; 3 color images at front: samurai facing small child with gift, on platform; man holding switch out of reach of small boy, with another man on the ground; boy walking down train tracks with oncoming steam engine; pages of text; black and white images, mostly of people in Western dress
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Color Prints of Stories for Moral Education (Nishiki-e shūshindan 錦絵修身談)
text: Three frontispieces; carved by Noguchi Enkatsu.
title: Color Prints of Stories for Moral Education, vol. 2
